text: Gwen Verdon (January 13, 1925 â€“ October 18, 2000) was an American dancer and actress. She acted on stage and in movies. She won four Tony Awards for her musical comedy performances. In the musical Damn Yankees, she played Lola. She played Abigail in The Farmer Takes a Wife. Verdon was born in Culver City, California. She died following a heart attack in Vermont at age 75. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Culver City, California Category:1925 births Category:2000 deaths
title: Gwen Verdon
